text: Béré is a town in the Tandjilé Region, Chad. It is known for its weekly market on Saturdays. The economy is agricultural-based, producing rice, sorghum, peanuts, sesame and cotton. ==Population== Population by years: {| class="wikitable" border="1" |+ ! 1993 !! 2012 est. |- | 10,799 || 14,666 |} ==Notable people== *Kaar Kaas Sonn (1973-), musician ==References== Category:Populated places in Chad
title: Béré, Chad
